data.name: Binary Run
data.detailed_description:
Binary Run is a synthwave inspired retro shooter with a blend of platforming, bullets and guns!
Enter a visually distinct world inspired by shooters of old blended with a gritty pixel styling reminiscent of old cutscenes.

  • Keep Running through 16 unique stages as you fight to stop the reformatting of your world styled to 80s computing.
  • Kill, collect and speed run the level to achieve your high score in each stage, each with it's own unique twist on the core gameplay.
  • Surf cars, crawl through the Dieode lairs and battle the mighty Etherlisks as you head for the Origin.

  • Choose your preffered way to purge this world, from the B15 Light-Gun to the Sonic Frisbee Forcer and many more.
  • Don't look back as the Reformatting is never far behind you as the very world is deleted.
  • Fight a unique boss each stage as the corrupted citizens in your world try to slow you down.

data.short_description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: You'll meet it on Stage 7
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: It hits hard

content_descriptors.notes: These games features guns, shooting and killer robots.
